page.title: 10Werrington Infants School
page.content: The school opened in 1981.The school building has a modern open plan design, with classrooms built around the central hall.The pupils may be admitted to the school in the term before their fifth birthday.The schoolhours are 9.05 to 12.00 and 1.15 to 3.05. The school has a very wide curriculum which contains such subjects as Religous Education,drawing,simple science lessons and sometimes Computer Education.Children are taught in mixed classes in the care of their own form teacher,who has responsibility for their education and welfare.Certain lessons,however,maybe taken by a specialist teacher,i.e. Music. Some teachers have help in the day to day running of their classrooms from a Welfare Assistant,Ancillary Assistants or N.N.E.B. Students and Parents are also welcome to help.
